name: Hold My Hand
description:
"Hold my hand!" - Player 1

This is a game about holding hands to solve puzzles. Every puzzle requires cooperation and a bit of physical contact. So get close, learn to depend on each other, and work together to the very end.

The game can be played solo with one controller, or with two people sharing a controller, as if holding hands.

If you don't have a controller, two players can play with the keyboard using the following controls (although not recommended for one player):

  • WASD = P1 movement
  • Arrow keys = P2 movement
  • F, period (.) = hold blue hands
  • G, comma (,) = hold red hands
